content:
公路局 北基二路工程處 CONSTRUCTION OFFICE TAIPEI-KEELUNG NO. 2 HIGHWAY TAIWAN HIGHWAY BUREAU NO. 66 SECT. 3 NANKING EAST ROAD TAIPEI, TAIWAN
REF. NO.
DATE_June 27 1962
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Dear Mr. Chang:
We, KiHB, KaHB, PWB and THB, have reviewed the Excess property list of U. S Naval Support Activity, Taipei, from your office and found that some of them are very useful for us.
叶雄网
140 112 213 82 Ten copies of needed items are enclosed here with, please contact AID to take necessary action on p/sp.
Your truly 8. H. Jung E, H. Fang Chief, R. C. T. T. H. B.
國史饭 Academia Historica
236
